Text: It works fine. I uploaded a half year ago and people were happy with it.

Greetings guys.

This I found out today: 

Make folder and you name it what you like. 

Put all files together in that folder

Open cmd.exe
type: 		de-Flight1.exe FlightZone01_v102.exe

Next step is different from other cracker-wrapper methods! Wachout!

[ Do NOT CLICK ON: OK _ PRESS (ok) when wrapper started!! Dont touch this. Mov it away! ]

Just click on: next from installer FlightZone 01: Rhode Island.

Next as usual. Sometimes it asks for a restart, sometimes not. 


This is a really beautifull scenery with very friendly framrates. 

(AL-Traffic Progs are the main framekillers) 

//----------------Thanks PopArt for uploading new cracker wrapper here. 


          //--WinnieXL

thx

has anyone found FS2Crew 747 or Angle of Attack?
Angle of Attack hasn't even been released yet...

Hey - I'm just curious if someone has the latest Beta of FSX they could upload. Can't find it anywhere.
Thx.
SK

Well, this does work. Got around to flying it in FS9. I flew around for around 6 hours with no trouble. Talk about boring, I went around and around Rhode Island in my Cessna 172. So yes, go ahead and get it, it works ;)
Can you guys please seed, I would appreicate it, I will seed for a very long time if this works!!!!!
